manifestFirst: We are not sure whether I can read the articles written here.
manifestSecond: I ask you, when you come here, if you want, share your memories and thoughts about me, maybe the funny moments you had with me or the moments you hated me. So that this virtual tombstone can turn into a rare collection.
manifestThird: Penguins are known as flightless birds. But I believe they are birds that refuse to fly.
footerQuote:
Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
-Mark Twain
